name: Moonlight Amethyst Dice Set
description: A set of seven polyhedral dice in a shimmering lavender color with white numbering. Each die has a glossy, marbled finish. The set is commonly used in tabletop role-playing games like Dungeons & Dragons.

name: Ambermist Dice Set
description: A captivating swirl of smoky gray and ember-red, the Embermist Dice Set evokes the image of glowing coals beneath a veil of ash. Each die features crisp golden numbers that catch the light like sparks in the dark, blending elegance with fire-forged energy. Perfect for players who bring both mystery and passion to the table.

name: D19
description: Try out our damage die for a drastic discount! This dastardly D19 was once a D20. Much to our dismay, an undependable side is dysfunctional.
